title: South Indian Spiced Rice
ingredients: ['950ml water', '375g long grain rice, rinsed and drained', '1/2 teaspoon salt, or to taste', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil, divided', '4 tablespoons coarsely chopped cashews', '7 small dried chillies', '1 teaspoon mustard seed', '1 teaspoon cumin seed', '10 fresh curry leaves', '1 teaspoon ground turmeric', '4 tablespoons fresh lime juice', '2 tablespoons tamarind paste', '250g natural yoghurt']
